tool_description: Para validar la información de un curp en méxico
name: Curp México
title: Curp México

api_list.name: Consulta de cédulas profesionales en México
api_list.description: Consulta de cédulas profesionales  en México
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://curp-mexico1.p.rapidapi.com/porcedula/2850579"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "curp-mexico1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
